successes.title: HERTZFELDT ON BLU-RAY
successes.description: Let's make a limited edition "It's Such a Beautiful Day" / "World of Tomorrow" Blu-ray !

Pledges.description:
: one copy of the bluray
: a strip of frames from IT'S SUCH A BEAUTIFUL DAY, cut from a 35mm print from don's collection. no two are alike.

: one copy of the bluray
: the above strip of frames
: one DVD copy of DON HERTZFELDT VOLUME 2:  featuring IT'S SUCH A BEAUTIFUL DAY, 45 minutes of interviews,  a deleted scene, and more

: one copy of the bluray
: one copy of the DON HERTZFELDT V2 DVD
: the out-of-print EVERYTHING WILL BE OK and I AM SO PROUD OF YOU DVD "singles",  each disc host to 100s of pages of exclusive making-of materials (sketches, bad ideas, deleted scenes, etc)
: one copy of the bluray,  signed by don

: one copy of the bluray, signed by don
: the above strip of frames from IT'S SUCH A BEAUTIFUL DAY
: the above DON HERTZFELDT V2 DVD

: one copy of the bluray
: one signed copy of THE END OF THE WORLD, the strange rare hardcover 2013 graphic novel with sequences that inspired moments in WORLD OF TOMORROW

: one copy of the bluray
: a limited edition 8.5 x 11" museum-quality art print from WORLD OF TOMORROW, signed by don.

: one copy of the bluray
: a limited edition 8.5 x 11" museum-quality "emily" art print from WORLD OF TOMORROW, signed by don.

: one copy of the bluray
: don will draw you a personalized thank you note. sorry, no weird special requests

THE EVERYTHING PACKAGE
: one signed copy of the bluray
: one of the above thank you notes
: one of the above signed art prints
: the signed book
: the film strip
: four out of print DVDs... DON HERTZFELDT VOLUME 1, DON HERTZFELDT VOLUME 2 + the EVERYTHING WILL BE OK and I AM SO PROUD OF YOU discs
